product_name: The North Face Rugher Insulated Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Working hard to protect you from the harsh elements of winter, The North Face Rugher Insulated jacket is waterproof, breathable and insulated to keep you charging down the mountain. Breathable, waterproof 2-layer coated HyVent(R) nylon shell fabric keeps you dry in snowy, wet conditions. Fully taped seams create the ultimate seal against wind and snow. Heatseeker(TM) Eco insulation offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio, is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather. Polyester taffeta lining easily slides over base layers. Hood protects you in inclement weather and features adjustments for a secure fit. Zippered underarm vents let you quickly control core temperature, expelling excess body heat as needed during high activity. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors for quicker acquisition of position in an avalanche. Internal powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. The North Face Rugher jacket features an internal goggle pocket, internal stash pocket, wrist pocket with goggle cloth, flap chest pockets and a zip flap chest pocket. Jacket also features dual-entry zippered handwarmer pockets, a window pocket pass and an external media pocket-tons of pockets to keep small items secure. Adjustable hem and cuffs seal out the cold. Closeout.
